channel.title: SkillSoft Skilling Server
channel.description:
Well I have been in the Private Server community for atleast 2 years now. I have finally decided to get a good server going
Server is mainly Skilling based but there is player killing and NPCs to fight
Server will have all skills except hunting and summoning for now Will also have new clips and an in game blog HiScores are a must
Skills will not take 3 days to get 99, expect to work on a skill for atleast 2-4 months just like RuneScape
I got src and webclient, aswell as a website just need a host... might buy my own but for now im willing to team up with some people

item.title: SkillSoft Skilling Server
item.dc:creator: @Timelimit10 Timelimit10
item.description:
@Timelimit10 wrote:

I know of several people who have tried to do such a thing. Skilling on a private server just isnt the same. Give me, a very open player, a reason to join your server and blow time on it. You need a draw. Slow leveling isnt it.

Read full topic

item.title: SkillSoft Skilling Server
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:7, topic:308173”]I will state two things here:

[]You need proof of work before you post a development.
[]People mainly join private servers for something different than runescape, but in a sense, still the same, they would also join for easy levelling-up, and cheats. Your concept of slow levelling won’t attract many players.[/quote]

I have released a few clients/web clients in the past plus a few servers iv done a little work to

and i already know alot of pplz that will join
i might not make it 2=4 months but its a good start

Read full topic

item.title: SkillSoft Skilling Server
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

I do not have any pics at the moment but am working on it.

And about the going to play runescape…
only reason ima make it take so long is so we can have a good and proper community instead of people who get 99 in 2 weeks and dont play anymore

Read full topic

item.title: SkillSoft Skilling Server
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

I usually don’t mind servers taking atleast a week to get 99 but 2-4 months? wuts point playing a server then for 99 in that one skill, wouldn’t people just go to runescape then?

Read full topic
